result.title: Delivery of UP-STAIRS Platform
result.description: UP-STAIRS digital platform will be delivered for engagement of different stakeholders and facilitating collective action. It will provide the following services: oDecision support services for the energy assessment of the community and its potential for local generation or service to the grid. This includes organisational, business and financial model and decision-support system for community-level energy management and renewable energy generation projects. oAn information repository on policy and regulatory adviceoA compendium of energy tutorials on key topics including behaviour change, prosumerism, collective actions and their benefit to consumers, and what it means to be an energy citizen in a sustainable energy community. oTraining materials for ICs designed to prepare them for the intricacies of UP-STAIRS Service delivery and expansion in a community

article.title: Bringing to market fast-charging cordless appliances
article.teaser: More and more cordless equipment is becoming available across a broad range of consumer and industrial products. The battery technology used in these devices is lithium-ion (Li-ion), but it has a limited lifetime and carries significant safety and environmental risks throughout the product life cycle.

section.sectionBody:
Thanks in part to EU funding, http://www.zapgo.com/ (ZapGoCharger) is developing a radical solution for these cordless products a new type of energy storage device that uses safe and recyclable materials that can sustain hundreds of thousands of charge/discharge cycles, says project coordinator Simon Harris. The device will be fast, safe and reliable.
Li-ion must be recharged very slowly, otherwise it risks combusting. Another drawback is its short shelf life, with only about 1 000 charge/discharge cycles. Its also very difficult to recycle. Over 95 % of Li-ion batteries end up in landfill.
Ultra-fast-charge carbon-ion cells
Overall, the aim of ZapGoCharger is to develop a new class of energy storage device with considerable functional improvements over commercially available supercapacitors. This technology is referred to as carbon-ion (C-ion).
C-ion incorporates highly conductive nanocarbons and novel ionic electrolytes that enable the design of rechargeable pouches or flat cells that can be used with a wide variety of electronic equipment. It has a very long lifespan, sustaining tens of thousands of charge/discharge cycles. C-ion contains recyclable materials and is non-flammable and completely safe to transport by air.
Ultimately, ZapGoCharger will develop fully tested, commercially viable C-ion power packs for cordless tools and cordless home appliances. Initially, the C-ion cells will be optimised for the requirements of this target market. Next, fully interchangeable C-ion power packs for existing cordless products will be developed. These demonstrator products will be used in customer trials to evaluate performance and gather market feedback ahead of their commercial rollout.
Harnessing battery cell technology to quickly scale up production
Project partners have built and exhibited a number of prototype demonstrator appliances driven by their pre-production pouch (Gen 2). The imminent release of Gen 3 will offer around 50 % greater power density. According to Harris, several customers in the home appliances sector have already made requests to be supplied with this pouch at an initial rate of 100 000 units per month. Meanwhile, researchers are working on the next generation (Gen 4). This involves a higher-voltage cell that utilises radical new technologies aimed at doubling the power output while greatly reducing the pouch size. The innovation is designed to charge in under five minutes. More importantly, it uses no Li-ion at all.
Vast market opportunities await
We have selected the home appliances sector as our first point of entry because our pouch is not yet small enough to fit into a mobile, while cordless tools and appliances often have the space to accommodate it, explains Harris. Beyond this sector, we have our sights set on emergency lighting, solar power banks, electric vehicles and, ultimately, the mobile phone itself.
The first commercial cells are scheduled for production in June 2018 when samples will be released to trial customers. Volume production will follow in the second half of the year.
An ever-expanding patent portfolio will be able to secure a sustainable competitive advantage in the home appliance market. To date, 14 patents have been filed, including two exclusive licenses from Oxford University. Registered design rights and trademarks have also been registered in key international markets.
By replacing traditional Li-ion batteries and taking the technology beyond the state of the art, ZapGoCharger will one day contribute to resolving the problems encountered by all current-generation rechargeable appliances, devices and vehicles, Harris concludes.

article.keywords: ZapGoCharger, cordless, C-ion, Li-ion, home appliance, charge/discharge cycle, energy storage device, carbon-ion, cordless appliances

project.teaser: Zap&Go has developed a fast charging solution to appliances, devices and vehicles. In contrast to Lithium-ion batteries, the dominant solution in these markets today, Zap&Gos supercapacitors charge in 5 minutes or less and are proven to be safe to handle without fire risk...

article.title: Tecnologas innovadoras sostenibles para la exploracin minera
article.teaser: Las tecnologas de exploracin innovadoras para buscar menas metalferas y minerales desarrolladas por varios proyectos financiados por el programa Horizonte 2020 estn ayudando a transformar Europa en una economa sostenible, competitiva y eficiente en el uso de recursos, al tiempo que abordan problemas ambientales y climticos. Este Results Pack destaca ocho proyectos europeos punteros que estn contribuyendo a lograr esta transicin.

section.sectionBody:
El acceso a los recursos es una de las principales cuestiones estratgicas de seguridad que rodean a la aplicacin del https://ec.europa.eu/info/publications/communication-european-green-deal_es (Pacto Verde Europeo). El Pacto Verde Europeo tiene por objeto convertir a Europa en el primer continente neutro en carbono para 2050. Para cumplir este compromiso, en julio de 2021 la Comisin Europea adopt una serie de https://ec.europa.eu/clima/eu-action/european-green-deal/2030-climate-target-plan_es#:~:text=With%20the%202030%20Climate%20Target,below%201990%20levels%20by%202030_es (propuestas legislativas) que incluyen el objetivo intermedio de una reduccin neta de al menos el 55% de las emisiones de gases de efecto invernadero para 2030.
La utilizacin sostenible de materias primas, incluidos los metales y los minerales, y en concreto las materias primas fundamentales como las tierras raras, es uno de los principales requisitos previos para que se materialice este cambio. Esto se debe a su papel fundamental en las cadenas de valor industriales, especialmente en los sectores de la energa, la movilidad, las tecnologas de la informacin y de las comunicaciones y la defensa, as como en la produccin de tecnologas de energa renovable, vehculos elctricos y telfonos mviles, entre otros.

Dado el aumento de la demanda de materias primas, la investigacin e innovacin europea financiada en el marco del programa Horizonte 2020 contribuye a mejorar el acceso a los metales y minerales, al tiempo que optimiza su consumo y mejora las condiciones de su extraccin en toda Europa.
El objetivo de la exploracin minera es buscar concentraciones comercialmente viables de menas y minerales para su explotacin minera. Dado que la explotacin minera tiene un carcter intensivo en capital, es fundamental realizar una estimacin muy precisa del volumen de los depsitos.
Entre los mtodos innovadores y sostenibles para el descubrimiento de metales y minerales figuran la exploracin y cartografa autnomas de minas inundadas y del lecho marino para obtener la informacin de alta resolucin necesaria para la identificacin fiable de yacimientos minerales. Otro mtodo consiste en mejorar la precisin de los modelos geolgicos y la evaluacin econmica de reservas minerales.
Adems, reducir los altos costes de exploracin y aumentar la participacin de la sociedad civil desde los primeros pasos de la exploracin ayudarn a aumentar la concienciacin y la comprensin de las comunidades locales y otras partes interesadas. La ampliacin de las tecnologas ms prometedoras y su comercializacin fortalecer la competitividad de las industrias europeas en este sector.

section.sectionTitle: La investigacin de la Unin Europea en el punto de mira
section.sectionBody:
Este Results Pack de CORDIS se centra en los resultados innovadores obtenidos por proyectos financiados por el programa Horizonte 2020 que trabajan en el desarrollo de tecnologas de exploracin destinadas a lograr un suministro sostenible de materias primas.
El proyecto https://cordis.europa.eu/article/id/413474/es (HiTech AlkCarb) rene a socios de toda Europa y frica para mejorar significativamente los modelos geolgicos para la prospeccin de materias primas de alta tecnologa como los elementos de tierras raras asociados con rocas alcalinas y carbonatitas.
https://cordis.europa.eu/article/id/413476/es (ROBUST) desarrolla un sistema autnomo de prospeccin robtica para identificar y analizar ndulos polimetlicos a gran profundidad en el ocano. https://cordis.europa.eu/article/id/413479/es (UNEXMIN) crea un robot muy sofisticado para explorar y cartografiar minas inundadas, recuperar datos geolgicos y realizar anlisis de la qumica del agua y de las propiedades de las paredes de la mina, mientras que https://cordis.europa.eu/article/id/413478/es (SOLSA) combina perforacin snica, equipos analticos e informtica para optimizar el rendimiento de las operaciones mineras.
https://cordis.europa.eu/article/id/413475/es (INFACT) disea tecnologas de exploracin minera innovadoras, no invasivas y socialmente aceptables para ayudar a aprovechar el potencial no utilizado de yacimientos nuevos o desarrollados. Por ltimo, https://cordis.europa.eu/article/id/413477/es (Smart Exploration), https://cordis.europa.eu/article/id/436268-finding-new-minerals-in-europe-using-environment-friendly-low-cost-technologies/es (PACIFIC) y https://cordis.europa.eu/article/id/436267-efficient-mineral-exploration-with-reduced-environmental-impact/es (NEXT) desarrollan soluciones rentables y respetuosas con el medio ambiente para la exploracin minera y llevan a cabo estudios para comprender mejor los factores que influyen en la aceptacin de la exploracin minera por el pblico.

article.title: Los datos heredados y la alta tecnologa abren nuevas vas para la exploracin minera de profundidad
article.teaser: La exploracin minera de profundidad presenta varios retos, ya sea en reas que han sido desarrolladas previamente (zona minera abandonada) o que podran ser desarrolladas desde cero (zona minera nueva). El proyecto financiado con fondos europeos Smart Exploration est desarrollando tecnologas para los dos tipos de zonas.

article.title: Respaldar el desarrollo del sector de la energa geotrmica en Europa
article.teaser: Como fuente de energa renovable prcticamente ilimitada, la geotermia es verstil, fiable y no depende de patrones climticos. Por ello, la energa geotrmica es un competidor serio y viable para catapultar a Europa al primer lugar como continente neutro en carbono de aqu a 2050.

article.title: Extraccin de minerales: garantizar el acceso a materias primas a costes ambientales y sociales mnimos
article.teaser: Las tecnologas vanguardistas de extraccin de minerales desarrolladas por varios proyectos de investigacin e innovacin, financiados por el programa Horizonte 2020 de la Unin Europea (UE), fortalecern la competitividad de la industria europea y reducirn los riesgos y las consecuencias para el medio ambiente, la salud y la seguridad. Los proyectos presentados en este Results Pack de CORDIS ayudarn a alcanzar los ambiciosos objetivos energticos y climticos planteados y contribuirn a que el sector minero se gane la confianza de los ciudadanos de Europa.

article.title: Un buzo robtico de alta tecnologa analiza las riquezas minerales de la Tierra en el fondo marino
article.teaser: A profundidades ocenicas de hasta 6km, las fuerzas de la Tierra crean preciadas formaciones minerales y metlicas dispersas por el paisaje submarino. El primer explorador robtico submarino autnomo para la identificacin y el anlisis in situ investigar muy pronto con delicadeza estas riquezas para su posible uso en coches elctricos y otros dispositivos.

article.teaser: El acceso seguro a materias primas es esencial para el xito econmico de Europa a largo plazo. La creciente demanda y la vulnerabilidad de las cadenas de suministro ante perturbaciones han llevado a la Comisin Europea a crear una lista de materias primas fundamentales (MPF) para la Unin Europea (UE), que se revisa y actualiza de forma regular.

article.title: El descubrimiento de yacimientos de materias primas para alta tecnologa zanja un cuello de botella en la produccin
article.teaser: Si el Reino Unido quisiera reemplazar todos sus coches por coches elctricos, necesitara el suministro mundial de neodimio de todo un ao para hacerlo realidad. Modelos geofsicos nuevos ayudarn a impulsar la extraccin de neodimio y otras materias primas bsicas para favorecer el desarrollo de tecnologas avanzadas y ecolgicas.

article.title: Soluciones innovadoras para la extraccin sostenible de materias primas
article.teaser: La vida moderna y los dispositivos que forman parte de ella, como los telfonos mviles, las televisiones de pantalla plana, los automviles, los paneles solares, los sistemas de guiado automtico, los motores a reaccin y los marcapasos, dependen de los recursos minerales. En este Results Pack se presentan siete proyectos de investigacin e innovacin financiados por Horizonte 2020 que ofrecen soluciones tecnolgicas concretas para la extraccin sostenible de minerales.

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as Digital transition).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to Europes biodiversitys path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

result.title: Readiness Assessment tool and financing strategies - draft
result.description: This report will explain a tool which will be developed to assess the financial maturity of the planned or ongoing local sustainable energy projects of the mentees. Mentees will be able to conduct the self-assessment at the end of the respective LC directly online. They will enter their project data into the Project Readiness Check tool by answering a set of questions to evaluate each projects finance readiness. The result of the project readiness check will be automatically determined based on the answers: it will indicate the level of finance readiness of the project to seek funding, highlight possible funding sources and if required, provide suggestions for potential improvements and recommendations of available support mechanisms (e.g. apply for ELENA funding if the proposal is very advanced, apply for EUCF funding for specific activities to further develop the proposal if it is medium advanced, etc.) to further develop the project proposal to make it finance-ready.Draft in month 18.

result.title: Virtual and physical events not under WP6 (x4). Final conference
result.description:
Four virtual and physical events not under WP6 | M12-M34 Ad hoc presence in major events: Information dissemination will be organised at minimum 4 privileged opportunities, when it is possible to efficiently reach the project target groups, e.g. a stand at the European Sustainable Energy Week, a presentation at the Concerted Action EPBD, an eceee event, etc.
Final conference | M35 A final conference will be organised in Brussels, to raise awareness and share the project findings at the EU level, ensuring their reproducibility and exploitation, especially work done in WP5 and 6. The main poject outcomes will be presented, including policy findings and recommendations. It will be organised at the end of the project, coinciding with the last Steering Committee meeting, and including external speakers as well as project partners. The goal would be to gather 100-150 participants, with a possible link with other relevant events, such as the EU Sustainable Energy Week, thus attracting stakeholders traveling to Brussels for the EUSEW. All partners will be involved in the agenda. The event will be summarised in a text briefing on the website; presentations will be recorded and shared via YouTube.
